case.name: Her panties are exposed!
case.description: Natsuki thinks her shirt's long enough to hide her panties. But it's not.

trigger.state: S-so what if my shirt's a little big? I just expected a growth spurt, n-not that you asked!
I don't think this is what Dad meant when he said I'd someday appreciate ill-fitting hand-me-downs.
Bye-bye bottoms. The torso's more important than the legs.
